import React,{useContext}from"react";import{FormDataContext}from"../../contexts/FormDataContext";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import"../../styles/flowOne/Form.css";// Import your stylesheet here
import{CSSTransition}from"react-transition-group";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const StepFour=()=>{const{formData,setFormData}=useContext(FormDataContext);const navigate=useNavigate();const handlePrevious=()=>{navigate("/step-three");};const handleNext=(numVehicles,event)=>{// Get the clicked button element
const button=event.currentTarget;// Add the 'green-active' class to make the button stay green
button.classList.add("green-active");// Determine the number of vehicles to save
const totalVehicles=numVehicles==="Yes"?2:1;// Generate an array of vehicles
const vehicles=Array.from({length:totalVehicles},(_,i)=>({id:i+1,make:"",model:"",year:""}));// Save the array of vehicles in localStorage
localStorage.setItem("vehicles",JSON.stringify(vehicles));// Save the total number of vehicles in localStorage
localStorage.setItem("numVehicles",totalVehicles);// Update the form data in context
setFormData({...formData,numVehicles:totalVehicles});// Delay the navigation to show the button effect
setTimeout(()=>{navigate("/step-five");},400);// Delay for noticeable green effect
};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CSSTransition,{in:true,appear:true,timeout:1500,classNames:"fade-slide",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"progress-bar-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"progress-bar",style:{width:"35%"}})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Would You Like to Insure More Than One Vehicle?"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"numVehicles",className:"savings-label",children:"You Can Save Up to 20%"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"options-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:`option-button ${formData.numVehicles===2?"selected":""}`,onClick:event=>handleNext("Yes",event),children:"Yes"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:`option-button ${formData.numVehicles===1?"selected":""}`,onClick:event=>handleNext("No",event),children:"No"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"buttons-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handlePrevious,children:"Previous"})})]})});};export default StepFour;
